patthana16.53:4.1: Sanidassanasappaṭigho nasanidassano dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.53:4.3: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.53:5.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.53:5.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
